descr.p: Methods for logging, usage data collection, system paths, database and system settings.

element.name: stopProcess
element.short: Global variable that indicates when the user cancelled a process.

element.name: isClosing
element.short: Indicates when the system is closing

element.name: wasSafelyTerminated
element.short: It is True if the application was terminated correctly

element.name: TXolmisSettings.LoadFromFile
element.short: Load all settings from file to fields

element.name: TXolmisSettings.SaveToFile
element.short: Save all settings from fields to file

element.name: AppDataDir
element.short: Get the user app data path.

descr.p: aCodigo Record key value, zero (default) for new records.
aOldValue Old value of the edited record.
aNewValue New value of the edited record.

element.name: LogError
element.short: Write error to the log file.

element.name: LogSQL
element.short: Write SQL command to the log file

element.name: LogEvent
element.short: Write system activity to the log file.

element.name: LogWarning
element.short: Write warning to the log file.

element.name: LogInfo
element.short: Write info message to the log file.

element.name: LogDebug
element.short: Write debug info to the log file.

element.name: CheckLogsFull
element.short: Check if the logs size reached the limit.

element.name: isOpening
element.short: It is True if Xolmis or a window is opening

element.name: isWorking
element.short: It is True if some process is running

element.name: NullDateTime
element.short: Get the null date and time constants

element.name: NewNotification
element.short: Add a new notification to the notification list

element.name: NewAlert
element.short: Add a new alert to the notification list

element.name: NewSystemNotification
element.short: Add a new system notification to the notification list
